Title: Einhell 4466270 TP-BS 18/457 Li BL - Solo Brushless Belt Sander 18V Bare Unit EINTPBS18457
Description:
The Einhell TP-BS 18/457 Li BL - Solo Belt Sander is a practical tool for evenly sanding large areas. Its brushless motor and electronic speed control are ideal for material and usage-oriented work, providing more control and power. There is also a continuous running lock for comfortable working.

The handle and additional handle with soft grip provide optimal handling. With tool-free belt adjustment and lock leaver for quick belt change. It also features an integrated storage surface for stationary use.

Part of the Power X-Change series, powered by Lithium-ion rechargeable batteries with a battery management system for a long-life. This belt sander comes as a Bare Unit, NO battery or charger. 

Supplied with: 3 x P80 Sanding Belts, 1 x Dust Box and 1 x Dust Extraction Adaptor.

Specifications:

Belt Speed: 120-250/min.
Belt Size: 75 x 457mm.
Sanding Surface: 75 x 126mm.
Weight: 2.58kg.
